div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: ğŸ‘¤ INTERNAL CONSUMERS

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: ğŸ“¤ OUTPUTS

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: âš¡ DISRUPTION â€” Triggers a reflow

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸ“‹ SETUP PHASE â€” Pre-defined, exists before reflow runs

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸ’¾ CURRENT STATE (snapshot)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸ—ï¸ Capital33 Platform â€” Decomposes trades into tasks

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: ğŸ¦ EXTERNAL ACTORS

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
execute trade
(T date)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
operating hours
blackout windows
compliance holds

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
committed to pay
but not yet settled

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: updated snapshot

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: âš™ï¸ REFLOW ENGINE â€” Batch recalculation on current snapshot

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Phase 3 â€” Validate & Report

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Phase 2 â€” Schedule Each Task (in topo order)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Phase 1 â€” Build Dependency Graph

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
next task
in topo order

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
âœ… Post-Reflow Validation
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Verify the output schedule:
â€¢ No channel overlaps
â€¢ All deps satisfied
â€¢ All work within op hours
â€¢ No blackout violations
â€¢ Regulatory holds untouched

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ”— DAG Construction
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Nodes = settlement tasks
Edges = dependsOnTaskIds

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ” Cycle Detection
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
If cycle found â†’ ERROR
'Circular dependency detected'

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ“ TOPOLOGICAL SORT
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Kahn's Algorithm (BFS)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
1. Find tasks with 0 in-degree
2. Add to priority queue
3. Process each:
â€¢ Schedule it
â€¢ Decrement neighbor in-degrees
â€¢ Enqueue newly 0-degree tasks
4. Tie-break: earlier startDate
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Guarantees: every task is
scheduled AFTER all its
upstream dependencies

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Is task
isRegulatoryHold?

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ”’ PINNED
Keep original dates
Cannot move
Still acts as dependency
source for downstream

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Compute Earliest Start
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
effectiveStart = max(
â€¢ latest dep endDate âœ…
â€¢ channel nextAvailable âœ…
â€¢ next operating window open âœ…
)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Then snap forward past any
blackout windows

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
â±ï¸ Calculate End Date
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
calculateEndDateWithOperatingHours(
effectiveStart,
durationMinutes,
operatingHours,
blackoutWindows
)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Consumes work-minutes ONLY
within valid operating windows.
Skips nights, weekends, blackouts.
Returns exact end timestamp.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ“ Update State
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ channel.nextAvailable = endDate
â€¢ Record: what moved, by how much
â€¢ Record: WHY it moved
(dep delay / conflict / blackout)

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ”„ BATCH RECALC MODEL
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
NOT a real-time reactive system.
Reads current state â†’ computes
new valid schedule for ALL
non-pinned tasks at once.
Think: spreadsheet recalc.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ“Š Metrics (Bonus)
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ Î£ total delay introduced
â€¢ Count of tasks affected
â€¢ Channel utilization %
â€¢ SLA breach flags
(tasks missing T+N deadline)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ğŸš§ CONSTRAINT CHECK ORDER

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
1ï¸âƒ£ Dependencies
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
All upstream tasks
must be complete

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
2ï¸âƒ£ Channel Conflicts
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
No overlapping tasks
on same channel

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
3ï¸âƒ£ Operating Hours
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Process only during
pre-defined market windows

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
4ï¸âƒ£ Blackout Windows
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Skip pre-declared
maintenance/regulatory blocks

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
ğŸ“Š Trade Desks
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Execute trades (T)
Agree on price/quantity
Payment NOT yet settled

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
âš–ï¸ Regulators
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Define operating hours
Declare blackout windows
Require compliance holds

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ‘¥ Counterparties
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Committed to pay
Cash/securities pending
until settlementDate (T+N)

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Trade Order arrives
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Platform generates a chain
of Settlement Tasks:
marginCheck
â†’ fundTransfer
â†’ complianceScreen
â†’ disbursement
â†’ reconciliation
Assigns each to a channel

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Settlement Tasks
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ taskReference
â€¢ settlementChannelId
â€¢ startDate / endDate
â€¢ durationMinutes
â€¢ dependsOnTaskIds[]
â€¢ isRegulatoryHold
â€¢ taskType
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
âš¡ Tasks are INTERRUPTIBLE
Processing pauses outside
valid windows, resumes
in next available slot

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Settlement Channels
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ operatingHours[]
(pre-defined weekly schedule)
â€¢ blackoutWindows[]
(pre-declared date ranges)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
ğŸ“Œ These are STATIC inputs
Already baked in before
reflow is called

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Trade Orders
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ tradeOrderNumber
â€¢ settlementDate (T+N)
= the DEADLINE
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â° If tasks can't complete
before this date â†’
SLA BREACH

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Something goes wrong:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ Counterparty fund transfer late
â€¢ Channel goes offline
â€¢ New blackout window declared
â€¢ Unplanned maintenance
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
â¬‡ï¸ Platform UPDATES the data
(adjusts task start, adds blackout)
then calls reflow with
CURRENT SNAPSHOT

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Updated Schedule
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
All tasks with
new startDate / endDate

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Change Log
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
Per task:
â€¢ original dates
â€¢ new dates
â€¢ delta (how much)
â€¢ reason (why)

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Errors / Warnings
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â€¢ Circular deps
â€¢ Impossible schedules
â€¢ SLA breaches
(missed T+N deadline)

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
ğŸ–¥ï¸ Operations Team
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Reviews new schedule
Acts on SLA breaches
Escalates if needed

div.style: color: rgb(224, 224, 224) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ğŸ“‹ Compliance Team
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Verifies regulatory holds
were not moved
Reviews blackout adherence

svg.text: Settlement Schedule Reflow â€” System Flow
